About the Company: MM Rubber Company Limited is part of a large group in South India manufacturing quality Latex Rubber Foam Products. MM Rubber manufactures and sells the latex rubber foam products under the brand name "MM FOAM" which has become synonymous with "latex foam". The Latex Rubber Foam Division was started in 1958 and has 47 years experience in the manufacture of Foam Rubber products... Mattresses, Pillows, Sofa Cushions, Upholstery, Luxury Bus Seats, Bolsters etc. MM Foam is the largest producer and seller of latex rubber foam mattresses in India.
